title: Where can I get Crusader Kings II for free? - Quora

response.answer_text: The only legal place to buy it is from Steam. Once Paradox had a sale where Crusader Kings 2 was free - but I think it was a one-day offer, and I don’t know if, or when, it will go on sale for free again. All places you can legitimately buy it online are only selling codes to download it via Steam, so it’s not worth the shipping cost to order it in physical form. Occasionally a YouTuber might have a free giveaway for the game too, but I haven’t seen that myself. To buy it legally, your best bet is to put it on your Steam Wishlist, and wait for it to (maybe) go on sale for free. I’ll pretend I’m not aware that you were asking where you can buy it pirated.
You can get CKII for free from any number of virus-ridden, illegal pirate sites. Or you could pay money to buy it legally on Steam.
